com.blukii.sdk.config

Class SmartSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blukii.sdk.config.Blukii
      • com.blukii.sdk.config.SmartSensor

  • public final class SmartSensor
extends Blukii

    Controller class for connection based communication with blukii devices of type SmartSensor.



    This class contains additional requests that are specific for blukii SmartSensors.

    See also class SmartSensor.OnConnectionListener that contains SmartSensor corresponding callbacks.

    Please following the instructions of the quick start documentation of base class Blukii.

    Note: Actually, for blukii SmartSensors only the core functionality of base class Blukii is provided. It is planned to implement SmartSensor specific functions soon!

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SmartSensor.OnConnectionListener
      Abstract class for callbacks of SmartBeacon specific requests.
